actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill, S.2945, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims a bill for the relief of two named individuals. Directs the Commissioner to report to the Senate on the nature of the claim against the United States and the amount, if any, due such individuals from the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill, S.2945, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
